page.title: 15 H.McMullan & Son
page.content: At the{oil depot}owned by Mr McMullan there were 4 huge tanks which held 17 000 gallons each. Two held{diesel fuel for cars,one held{vapourising oil for the old tractors, and the last one held{central heating oil.}About once a day there is a tanker in to get filled before delivery to a house or garage. The oil which the McMullans have comes from{Rotterdam}and is refined at a {Maxol refinery in England.}They have agreed to sell only{Maxol products. There was a huge{petrol tank underground which held about 12 000 gallons. McMullans also sell 500 gallon{oil storage tanks}for central heating.
